title: Magalir Mattum(2017) Songs Lyrics
stanzas: This year seem to be favor for Women. Lot of movies featuring heroines as main role are planned to be released. e.g. Dora, Kolaiyuthir Kaalam , Magalir Mattum and more to come..
Motion poster of "Magalir Mattum"is Snazzy. Jothika looks slim , sleek and gorgeous. She is one heroine, I would say , I am a Fan for ever and ever.
<u>Teaser </u>is planned to be released on <u>Feb 4th 6pm</u> ... Lot of fans looking forward to see Jothika on screen after her great come back  in "36 Vayadhinile"
